item.description:
Ever want to learn to blues dance, or wondered what it was all about? Here's your chance to learn from the best instructors in the world! bluesSHOUT! 2011 is coming to Boston on August 19th-21st.

 

bluesSHOUT! is the nation's premier blues dance weekend, and has everything you could ask for in a dance event - classes during the day, social dancing and inspiring competitions at night, and both live music from local blues musicians and the best DJs in the country! Classes are extremely diverse, and offer something for everyone, from complete beginners to masters level dancers. We have 13 instructors this year (many of whom live right here in town!) and you'll be sure to find a full set of classes to fit your skill level and interests.

 

We'd love to have you join us! Passes are available for the full weekend as well as dances only. Check out our website for everything you need to know!

 

www.bluesshout.com

 

Prices:

Main dances: Fri/Sat/Sun: $25/$25/$20
Late nights: $15

Day-pass for classes: $70/day

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: BluesSHOUT 2011
